Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions

Class TryAgainException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions.TryAgainException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CharacterCardAlreadyPlayedException, CharacterCardNotFoundException, EmptyBagException, EmptyCloudException, FullTableException, InvalidNumberOfStepsException, IslandNotFoundException, NonExistentColorException, NotEnoughCoinsException, NoVetoTilesException, StudentNotFoundException, WrongMessageSentException, WrongTurnException
public class TryAgainException extends Exception
This exception is the super-class of every custom exception (except TieException). This choice was made because every subclass, if error handling is required (which is not always the case, e.g. EmptyBagException), when caught, triggers some sort of "try again", allowing the user to reinsert input.
